answers.answer: I've never had it before but ive had preeclampsia.. Best thing to do is listen to the drs and do exactly what they tell u. :) prayers for u. Don't stress too much everything will be just fine.
follow the food plan and keep your sugars in check with diet and medication and youll be fine (: im going on 36 weeks and have known about my gd since 10 weeks

question: I'm only 9 weeks and have gestational diabetes... I'm so scared...
title: 9 weeks and GD
